The original claim was found to be fake: as it was posted on a parody site that makes up bogus news stories.
The expert verified that Paul Ryan did m: Friends about people choosing not to buy something they don't like or want, but he did not make the statement about people choosing to be poor.
The expert reached out to Ryan: s office for comment, and a spokeswoman did not provide any comment on the fake quotes.
The expert discovered that the site wher: Politicot.com, is part of a network of sites related to Newslo.com, which is a hybrid news/satire platform. The administrator of the site, Eli Sompo, runs sites based in Israel and Greece and has stated that he did not write the stories on the websites for which he is responsible.
